cause.description:
We can never get back those many hours we spent attending his 'lectures' but this group aims to raise awareness and get reparations for the students whose lives have been blighted in the presence of this man.
Maybe one day, with your help, we will be able to pick up a Kerouac novel without shuddering...one day.
1. No more tackle revealing tracksuit bottoms Steve
2. No more ski-boarding clothes Steve
3. No more Wikipedia lectures, 'random' tangents and 'random' , unfunny jokes Steve
cause.name: Foundation for victims of Dr Steve
